results.title: When Some Critics Reject the Film That’s About Your Life

results.title: Adolfo Quiñones, an Early Star of Street Dance, Dies at 65
results.abstract: Mr. Quiñones, also known as Shabba-Doo, rose to fame in the movie “Breakin’” and helped bring a distinctly urban kind of movement to the mainstream.

multimedia.caption: Adolfo “Shabba-Doo” Quiñones in a scene from the 1984 movie “Breakin’.” Produced on a modest budget, the film was a hit and made Mr. Quiñones one of the first celebrities of street dance.
